function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased cases, deaths, and economic crisis","Mitigation":"Implement preventive measures, increase public health measures, and improve situational awareness","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, mass testing technology, vaccine development","People":"Global population","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Insufficient preventive measures and lack of situational awareness","Impact":"Uncontrolled outbreaks and increased transmission","Mitigation":"Strengthen public health measures, increase hygiene practices, and stockpile enough medical supplies","Technologies":"Pathogen testing technology, public health surveillance systems","People":"Public health workers, government authorities","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate vaccine formulation and distribution","Impact":"Inability to achieve herd immunity and control the spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Invest in vaccine research, improve production capacity, and ensure equitable distribution","Technologies":"Vaccine development and production technologies","People":"Global population","Owner":"Pharmaceutical companies, government authorities"}]}
